channel.title: Anyone else know about Concerned 2?
channel.description:
Just finished Concerned again. Just as bummed out as last time. :frowning: So I searched around found this website [url='https://aconcernedrip-off.webs.com/']Concerned 2: the continuing adventures of Gordon Frohman[/url] and thought you guys might like to know about it.
Sadly it hasn't updated since late 2010, with no updates on what's up. :[ But, I'm trying to get traffic back up to the website, in an attempt to gain the creator's attention. I've used the contact button to try to message him, but I don't know if that will do any good. Any help would be appreciated to get in contact with him, maybe at least get him to say goodbye. :'(

item.title: Anyone else know about Concerned 2?
item.dc:creator: X_Mastershot_X
item.description:
CPU:

He wouldn’t respond? That really makes me concerned 2!

/thread win

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else know about Concerned 2?
item.dc:creator: lithium.bb
item.description:
Yeah, I followed that for a while back before it died, and I’m assuming he’s not planning on continuing it any more, unfortunately. Shame, it was fairly entertaining while it lasted.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone else know about Concerned 2?
item.dc:creator: Medkit
item.description:
Thanks for telling us! I checked the last few pages, not as good as the original concerned, but I think it’s ok. Btw, a different guy is doing this it seems.

item.title: Anyone else know about Concerned 2?
item.dc:creator: TheDragonMask
item.description:
Just finished Concerned again. Just as bummed out as last time. So I searched around found this website Concerned 2: the continuing adventures of Gordon Frohman and thought you guys might like to know about it.

Sadly it hasn’t updated since late 2010, with no updates on what’s up. :[ But, I’m trying to get traffic back up to the website, in an attempt to gain the creator’s attention. I’ve used the contact button to try to message him, but I don’t know if that will do any good. Any help would be appreciated to get in contact with him, maybe at least get him to say goodbye. :’(
